text:
Abbas Duzduzani (Persian: عباس دوزدوزانی) (June 5, 1942 – July 29, 2018) was an Iranian politician. He was in the Mohammad-Ali Rajai cabinet. He was founder and first commander Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps. He was born in Tabriz, Iran. He was the Minister of Culture and Islamic Guidance from 1980 to 1981.
Duzduzani died on July 29, 2018 in Tehran at the age of 76.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Culture and Islamic Guidance
